long_description: A replacement cartridge for CO2 inflators, the Planet Bike 12g Threadless CO2 Cartridge offers a medium level of inflation for any type of tire. Approximately inflates a 29 in. mountain bike tire up to 25 psi (1.7 BAR), a 26 in. mountain bike tire up to 30 psi (2.0 BAR), a 700c road tire to 90 psi (6.2 BAR). Approximately inflates a 700c touring tire to 62 psi (4.3 BAR) and a 700c cyclocross tire to 38 psi (2.6 BAR). The Planet Bike 12g Threadless CO2 Cartridge is compatible Planet Bike Airship CO2 inflator, sold separately.
short_description: A replacement cartridge for CO2 inflators, the Planet Bike 12g Threadless CO2 Cartridge offers a medium level of inflation for any type of tire.
